name: admin
description: Super user, can manage other users and permissions.

name: manager
description: Allowed to suggest, make changes and QA and approve actions

name: editor
description: Allowed to suggest, make changes and QA

name: commentator
description: Can view the data, but cannot make any changes other than reporting/flagging and commenting.

name: viewer
description: Can only view the data, and is unable to report/flag or comment.
